data.name: error indicator
data.definition: Indicator that an item is in error.

data.name: error rate
data.definition: Number of the erroneous items with respect to the total number of items that should have been present.

data.name: error count
data.definition: Total number of items that are subject to an error of a specified type.

data.name: correctness indicator
data.definition: Indicator that an item is correct.

data.name: correct items count
data.definition: Total number of items that are free of errors of a specified type.

data.name: correct items rate
data.definition: Number of the correct items with respect to the total number of items that should have been present.

data.name: 1D variable 50 % probability
data.definition: Confidence interval given by the probability P=50 % of the true value being between the lower and upper limit.

data.name: 1D variable 50 % probability; 1 redundant measurement
data.definition: Confidence interval for probability P=50 % derived from t-distribution by 1 redundant measurement.

data.name: Spherical error probable
data.definition: Radius of sphere centered at the true position, containing the position estimate in 3D with probability of 50%.

data.name: Mean radial spherical error
data.definition: Radius of sphere centered at the true position, containing the position estimate in 3D with probability of 61%.

data.name: 90% spherical accuracy standard
data.definition: Radius of sphere centered at the true position, containing the position estimate in 3D with probability of 90%.

data.definition: Radius of sphere centered at the true position, containing the position estimate in 3D with probability of 99%.
